componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: All of our tech partners, all in one place

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Collaboration is key when it comes to improving teaching and learning, which is why we’ve partnered with 60+ education technology partners who’ve integrated our free content with their platforms. These platforms offer extra features to support teaching, ranging from online homework to auto-grading to labs and beyond! To help you navigate which partner best suits your needs, we've created Tech Scout.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Everything you need to know about Tech Scout below!

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: With Tech Scout, you’re able to...

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Find the tools you need for your course based on 12+ filters, like LMS integration, cost, and online teaching features

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Read other instructors’ reviews for each product or leave your own review

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Request additional information directly from our partners

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Want to see what courseware, online homework, and other technologies are available for your subject? Take a look at Tech Scout today!
